title: anonymousminer
author: anonymousminer
created_time: December 09, 2023, 10:13:36 PMLast edit: December 12, 2023, 04:40:37 PM by anonymousminer
content: Another AMAZING offering ladies and gentlemen! Today we have a piece of art that we rarely see come up for sale/auction. ¬†The piece today is print #20/50 of the 2017 CRYPTOGRAFFITI original called SILK ROAD.The print is 24in x 24in (61cm x 61cm)The print is hand signed 20/50The print comes unframed and in it's original tubeFor more information on the original piece of art, it can be found here:https://cryptograffiti.com/products/silk-roadStock photo of the original artwork from the websitePhoto of a framed print in use for reference - this is NOT the print you will receive.Photo of the ACTUAL print you will receive:Photo of the ACTUAL print you will receive:**The last time one of these changed hands it was for 17.5k USD. ¬†We couldn't get an exact date or BTC amount, just that the 2 parties agreed on 17.5k USD and that the item did in fact change hands**STARTING BID: 0.200BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 3 decimal places**END TIME: December 18th 2023 16:00EST (4:00PM New York Time)**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: PAYMENT: BTC: bc1q894n6jtgnn5t8ll9elk4ek7c04rwg2j9ptwe7aSHIPPING: Item will be sent to minerjones for reshipping.OWNER: NOT DISCLOSEDESCROW: With minerjones at buyers expense** I would recommend that any newbie accounts that plan to be active for the end of the auction purchase a copper membership to the forum as newbie accounts have posting limitations **Copper Memberships can be purchased here: https://bitcointalk.org/more.php ¬† ¬†then click "Buy a copper membership" theymos' OP announcing the Copper membership can be found here: ¬†https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2385104
